comprehensive_overview: ChewBBACA (Chew Sequence-Based Typing Tool) is a suite of tools specifically designed for whole-genome sequence analysis, dedicated to the provision of high-resolution sequence-based microbial genotyping.
core_features:
1. Whole-genome sequence analysis
2. High-resolution microbial genotyping
3. Detection of core and accessory genome elements
4. Support for bacterial typing tasks
5. Analysis of large genomic datasets
6. Phylogenetic inference and visualization
